panels.title: Retry Queue - Success vs Failure Ratio
S3 Write Failures by Error Category
Persister - End-to-End Persistence Latency (p50, p95, p99)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(layer_cache_read_latency_ms_bucket{exported_job=~"${service}", cache_name=~"${cache}", backend="${backend}", result="hit"}[$__interval])) by (cache_name, le))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(layer_cache_read_latency_ms_bucket{exported_job=~"${service}", cache_name=~"${cache}", backend="${backend}", result="miss"}[$__interval])) by (cache_name, le))
